eng: As the letter A is the first of all letters, so is the Almighty the first in the world.
What profit have those derived from learning, who worship not the good feet of Him who is possessed of pure knowledge?
They who are united to the glorious feet of Him who passes swiftly over the flower of the mind, shall flourish long above all worlds.
Long life on earth is attained by those who are free from desire and aversion.
The two-fold deeds that darken life shall not adhere to those who praise the God whose praise is light.
None can swim the vast ocean of births but those who clasp the feet of the Almighty.
Except those who meditate the feet of Him who is incomparable, it is hard to overcome the mental distress.
None but those who reach the feet of Him, who is the ocean of virtue, can cross the sea of births.
He who has made all this world with his instruments of five senses is beyond understanding.
To those who reach His feet who removes rebirth, there will be no future births caused by karma.
Section: Virtue - Subsection: Introduction to Virtue
Rain supports the Earth and helps the world prosper — thus it is charity that sustains life.
Even if the heavens lie, it is greater to stand by truth and not lie.
When the world worships unceasingly, prosperity will arrive like steady rain.
Only that which comes from virtue is pleasure — all else lacks both fame and value.
There is no wealth greater than virtue; forgetting it is forgetting honor itself.
All that is not virtue is only another kind of sin that leads to rebirth.
Only the household life led by virtue is worthy — not one that brings disgrace to others.
The good see evil actions and their consequences and thus cherish good thoughts in their hearts.
All lives are equal at birth; only by their actions do they differ in greatness.
